taskGroup.name: Query your models using IncQuery
taskGroup.intro: EMF-IncQuery is a technology, that can be used to efficiently query EMF instance models in an incremental way. Completing the tasks you will know how to create an IncQuery plug-in, how to use it, and where to look for further information. These sheets guide you through a library example, that works immediately.

task.name: Creating an EMF-IncQuery Project
task.intro: This sheet describes how to create an EMF-IncQuery plug-in project from an EMF metamodel.

task.name: Inspecting the Generated Code
task.intro: An EMF-IncQuery plugin provides only the code base to perform queries. This cheat sheet describes the automatic creation of a sample project, that can be used form the GUI. The generated code can also be inspected to write your own code.
